description:
Integrity. Compassion. Experience. Results. Those are just of a few of the terms that exemplify the law firm of Connor & Connor, LLC. We are a civil trial firm devoted to offering highly skilled representation in a broad spectrum of complex, high-stakes cases. With offices in Augusta, Georgia, and Aiken, South Carolina, our lawyers serve injured individuals and their survivors where death has occurred throughout Georgia, the Carolinas and beyond.

Our law firm maintains a particular focus on cases involving personal injury and wrongful death, nursing home abuse and neglect, medical malpractice, products liability, premises liability and business and employment litigation. Connor & Connor, LLC, also offers trial assistance to attorneys throughout the U.S. and litigation supervision and oversight to public officials, CEOs and other high-profile individuals.

Attorney Kenneth L. Connor has been practicing law for nearly 40 years. Ken is a widely respected trial lawyer who pioneered nursing home abuse and neglect litigation. Licensed to practice in 14 different states and the District of Columbia, he has achieved verdicts exceeding $160 million in the aggregate for his clients.

A few highlights of Ken's career include serving as president of the Family Research Council, serving on Florida's Constitution Revision Commission and serving on former Florida Governor Jeb Bush's Task Force on the Availability and Affordability of Long Term Care. Ken also represented Governor Bush in connection with the Terri Schiavo case.

Attorney C. Caleb Connor is the other founding member of Connor & Connor, LLC. He has significant experience in business, labor and employment law, as well as a broad range of civil litigation matters.
